spells.description: Use: Zoom in on the targeted location.

item.name: Eternal Helm of the August Acolyte

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Eternal Helm of the August Acolyte

effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 288,480 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 148,105.
Set: Casting Renewing Mist applies Insurance! for 6 sec. The healing of Insurance! is increased by up to 50% in proportion to the coverage Renewing Mist has on you and up to 10 allies.

item.name: Eternal Spaulders of the August Acolyte

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Eternal Spaulders of the August Acolyte

name: Irradiated Undercoat

spells.description: Equip: Chance on hit to draw Unstable Isotopes from any Irradiated Elemental or Contaminated Glob.

Use: Absorb 100 Unstable Isotopes, increasing threat generation by 20%, Nature damage taken by 5%, and periodically heals the caster for 1% to 5% per 6 sec for 30 min.

Only usable on Mechagon Island. (1 Day Cooldown)

description: The metal links have a slight green glow to them. Wearing it cannot possibly be good for you.

name: Faded Championship Ring
description: 'I got one more in me' - Unknown

spells.description: Use: Become the pinnacle of Gallagio service excellence and dole out Kaja'Cola Mega-Lite to injured allies 10 times over 4 sec, healing them for 986,982 and increasing their Speed by 1,758 for 5 sec. The number of servings is increased by your Haste. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Use: Command the Medichopper to attach to your target, absorbing 197,823 damage and granting them 1,338 versatility for 15 sec.

While attached, your healing spells have a chance to refuel the chopper, granting these bonuses to their host again. (2 Min Cooldown)
